General.Name: HighPeak Energy Inc
General.Description: HighPeak Energy, Inc., an independent oil and natural gas company, engages in the exploration, development, and acquisition of oil and gas properties in the United States. Its primary assets are located in Howard County of the Midland Basin. The company was founded in 2019 and is headquartered in Fort Worth, Texas.
General.Address: 421 West 3rd Street, Fort Worth, TX, United States, 76102
